aspect.name: Proteins
aspect.subtitle:
Protein and proteomics
data
aspect.intro-text: Protein annotation (including family and domain annotation) from UniProt .

aspect.name: Protein Interactions
aspect.subtitle: IntAct
aspect.intro-text: Proteins formatted in the Proteomics Standards Initiative (PSI) molecular interaction (PSI MI) format can be mapped to the MalariaMine data model.

aspect.name: Gene Ontology
aspect.intro-text:
The Gene Ontology (GO) project is a collaborative effort to address the need for consistent descriptions of gene products in different databases.

The GO collaborators are developing three structured, controlled vocabularies (ontologies) that describe gene products in terms of their associated biological processes, cellular components and molecular functions in a species-independent manner.

GO annotations for Plasmodium falciparum 3D7 have been loaded into MalariaMine. The GO annotations are 'attached' to Genes and so each gene has a reference (link) to a list of its GO annotations (if available).
